page.title: 11GHOSTS OF MATHON
page.content: It is said that there are two ghosts in Mathon.One is on the back road to Mathon Court.Dogs bark at invisible things and go mad.The other is said to be an old school mistress sitting on a bench outside the old school.They are both ladies.I think that the one at Mathon Court was caused by a squabble about who should own Mathon Court and her evil nephew murdered her and claimed Mathon Court for himself.Then it was rebuilt when the nephew died. The other was caused by suicide.the stairs had fallen in after a German bomb had dropped and caused a fire.The fire was on the upper floor only.She had lowered a wooden ladder through the window and the boys had escaped.But,to stop the fire from spreading,she hoisted the ladder back up and she was burnt.But,you might think differently.
